abstract: Stocks rise modestly as investors look for bargains.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Men’s Wearhouse and First Solar were down after the companies reported quarterly earnings.

headline.main: Recovering Energy Shares Help Market End a Skid
headline.print_headline: Modest Gains for Market as Investors Seek Bargains

snippet: Shares of Men’s Wearhouse and First Solar were down after the companies reported quarterly earnings.
